title: 4: Tax Scam for Billionaires and Multinational Corporations
itunes:title: Tax Scam for Billionaires and Multinational Corporations
description: Joe is joined by “Evil Geniuses” author Kurt Andersen to discuss the rising income gap, the conservative argument for taxing the Super Rich and asks why politicians in both parties refuse to regulate the Facebook Monopoly.
itunes:author: The Joe Scarborough Podcast
